title: San Jose: Peace Vigil - Ceasefire Now! No Weapons for Israel or Ukraine! : Indybay
text: From the Open-Publishing Calendar From the Open-Publishing Newswire Indybay Feature San Jose: Peace Vigil - Ceasefire Now! No Weapons for Israel or Ukraine! Date: Friday, June 21, 2024 Time: 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM Event Type: Vigil/Ritual Organizer/Author: Angela Location Details: in front of MLK Library 4th and San Fernando San Jose, CA 4th and San Fernando San Jose, CA We are on the corner of 4th and San Fernando Streets every Friday from 5 to 6pm. Join us to to take a stand in opposition to war and militarism and in solidarity with Black Lives Matter and all movements working for racial and economic justice. Bing your own signs or use one of ours! Bing your own signs or use one of ours! For more information: https://sanjosepeace.org/calendar/ Added to the calendar on Thu, Jun 6, 2024 1:29PM We are 100% volunteer and depend on your participation to sustain our efforts! Get Involved If you'd like to help with maintaining or developing the website, [contact us](/contact). Publish Publish [your stories](/publish.php) and [upcoming events](/calendar/event_add.php) on Indybay.
